titles.title: To designate the federal facility administered by the Bureau of Land Management located at 600 N 350 W in Delta, Utah, as the "Gale V. Bennett Wild Horse and Burro Building".
To designate the federal facility administered by the Bureau of Land Management located at 600 N 350 W in Delta, Utah, as the "Gale V. Bennett Wild Horse and Burro Building".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests and Public Lands.

bill.summary: Designates the federal facility administered by the Bureau of Land Management (BLM) located at 600 N 350 W in Delta, Utah, as the "Gale V. Bennett Wild Horse and Burro Building."
